title: RECPDCL inks initial pact with Gujarat govt for smart metering projects worth Rs 2,094 crore
description: REC Power Development and Consultancy Ltd (RECPDCL) has signed an initial pact with the Gujarat government for Rs 2,094.28 crore in smart metering projects in Paschim Gujarat Vij Company Ltd (PGVCL) under the Revamped Distribution Sector Scheme.
